categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Dark Lord is an original German-language audio drama adaptation of Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader. It is a full-cast scripted audio play based on the German version of the novel, similar to the English-language radio drama versions of the original trilogy. The CDs were released by WortArt in 2008 as part of a two-set series, along with Labyrinth des Bösen, adapting James Luceno's novels that follow Anakin Skywalker/Darth Vader immediately before and after the events of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.
